SEARCH
Package org.demoiselle.signer.core.timestamp

Interface TimeStampGenerator

public interface TimeStampGenerator
Methods for generate a TimeStamp based on Time Stamping Authority (TSA) service. See RFC 3161 for details.
Author:
07721825741

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    byte[]
    generateTimeStamp()
     
    void
    initialize(byte[] content, PrivateKey privateKey, Certificate[] certificates, byte[] hash)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize(byte[] content, PrivateKey privateKey, Certificate[] certificates, byte[] hash) throws CertificateCoreException
      Parameters:
      content - to be sign, if it is the parameter hash must to be null
      privateKey - authorized to use a TSA service
      certificates - trusted chain
      hash - to be sign, if it is assigned the parameter content must to be null
      Throws:
      CertificateCoreException - exception

    • generateTimeStamp

      byte[] generateTimeStamp() throws CertificateCoreException
      Returns:
      timestamp
      Throws:
      CertificateCoreException - exception

    • validateTimeStamp

      void validateTimeStamp(byte[] content, byte[] response, byte[] hash) throws CertificateCoreException
      Parameters:
      content - to be sign, if it is the parameter hash must to be null
      response - signed timestamp from TSA
      hash - to be sign, if it is assigned the parameter content must to be null
      Throws:
      CertificateCoreException - exception
